name: Mp3 converter
short_description:
Mp3 converter is easy program tool used to easily convert over 50 formats. Ranging from avi, flv, wma, ogg and more. The program has a very simple name, but the features are amazing and the simplicity of it is beautiful!

You can use this free software for all of your file conversion needs! 

You Can chose from either one of these 2 download locations

http://download.cnet.com/MP3-Converter/3000-2140_4-75747802.html

http://mp3-converter.me/

Don't think you need a software to convert all of your media files? Always remember that your flv files can be converted to mp3 files so that you can load them on your ipod or zune. This piece of freeware was actually made for the end user in mine. Meaning we wanted it to be usable by everybody.

It is fast, and easy to use, plus the conversion speeds are of the charts!!

If you are looking for that one program in which you can take all of your file converting needs. Then mp3 converter is the software for you.
summary: Mp3 converter is a free and easy program tool.
